description.displayText: She was an outstanding for our newborn twins and stayed with us for three years until they started pre-school.  She is professional, reliable, flexible and her focus on the well-being of the children.  She interacts with them in a positively reinforcing manner and teaches them through play.  Given our extremely busy schedule, she was able to be flexible and ensure that our children always had coverage. A must!

description.displayText: Nicole worked for our family when our son was 20 months old and we also had 11 month old triplets.She was very hard working and was able to take care of the 4 children and help with chores around the house. Nicole is a very honest and reliable person and I would recommend her to any family looking for a caring, warm professional to take care of their children.
description.originalText: Nicole worked for our family when our son was 20 months old and we also had 11 month old triplets.She was very hard working and was able to take care of the 4 children and help with chores around the house. Nicole is a very honest and reliable person and I would recommend her to any family looking for a caring, warm professional to take care of their children.

description.displayText: Nicole, or NiNi as our twins called her, was outstanding.  She worked and lived in our home for 3 years - until the twins started preschool.  She was extraordinarily adept with early childhood development and was resourceful to ensure that our kids were extremely well-cared for, safe, socially integrated in community activities (play groups, sing-alongs, museums, outdoor activities, learning through play) and used positive reinforcement throughout their activities. She is incredibly resourceful, reliable and taking care of the babies was always her first priority.  The next kid or kids will be lucky to have her - ours have become self-confident, socially engaging and learned greatly under her supervision.  Two thumbs up!
